Description: Fragment of flattened handle from a Thasian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine micaceous light ginger-brown; white inclusions. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and shield symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Kychris. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 101a, 59
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0033)
